contributionDescription: I have contributed to the transactions made to the network used the network to create some transactions such as swap of crypto, buying of NFT and tried to explore optimism network. while on the other half i have tried to use bridge of other network to bridge eth to the network.

contributionLinks.description: Some of the transactions made on the network

impactDescription: Because pf this transactions which are all made on the optimism network, i was able to contribute to the networks stability and networks upgrades . Nonetheless i was just an individual contributor that used the network for my own sake nothing else. But I think i was able to contribute to the greater good of our network.

fundingSources.description: I havent receive any fund yet.

pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged for violating rule 10 as the user interactions like the transactions stated in the application are not within the scope of RetroPGF grants.
pwCategorySuggestions: Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), Layer 2 Scaling
